Package com.nuix.nx.controls.models

Class ChoiceTableModel<T>

java.lang.Object
javax.swing.table.AbstractTableModel
com.nuix.nx.controls.models.ChoiceTableModel<T>
Type Parameters:
T - The data type of the of the Choice instances which will be held by this model.
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable, TableModel
public class ChoiceTableModel<T> extends AbstractTableModel
Table model used by the ChoiceTableControl
